The keris is a dagger obtained after defeating the giant scarab at the end of the Contact! quest, and is the precursor to the keris partisan. It deals 33% bonus damage against all kalphites and scabarites, and has a 1/51 chance of puncturing a hole in their exoskeleton, dealing triple damage. When the special effect occurs, the chatbox will display the message: You slip your dagger through a chink in the creature's chitin, landing a vicious blow.

The keris requires 50 Attack to wield. Like most daggers, it can be poisoned. Its stab attack is identical to that of a dragon dagger, although its strength bonus is 10 lower. It has the second-highest bonus of the three prayer bonus-providing daggers, giving +2 compared to the white dagger's +1 and Wolfbane's +5. Despite this, the keris proves superior — unless fighting werewolves, in the case of Wolfbane. It is needed to kill a locust rider or scarab mage for a Hard Desert Diary task.

It is lost on death if it is not protected, and can be retrieved from Osman, (or Selim, after Beneath Cursed Sands), for a fee of 20,000. Alternatively, it can be reclaimed from Perdu for a fee of 25,000.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
7 July 2021
(update)

The position of the weapon and its variants on female players has been adjusted so that they appear to be equipped properly.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Keris is one of five daggers with its blade pointing down; the other four are the dragon dagger, abyssal dagger, Killer's knife, and Hunting knife
  • The keris is based on the south-east Asian weapon called a kris (and sometimes kêrìs).

The '''keris''' is a [[dagger]] obtained after defeating the [[giant scarab]] at the end of the [[Contact!]] quest, and is the precursor to the [[keris partisan]]. It deals 33% bonus damage against all [[kalphites]] and [[scabarites]], and has a 1/51 chance of puncturing a hole in their exoskeleton, dealing triple damage. When the special effect occurs, the chatbox will display the message: {{RSFont|You slip your dagger through a chink in the creature's chitin, landing a vicious blow.}}

The keris requires 50 [[Attack]] to wield. Like most daggers, it '''can''' be [[poison]]ed. Its [[stab]] attack is identical to that of a [[dragon dagger]], although its [[strength bonus]] is 10 lower. It has the second-highest bonus of the three [[prayer bonus]]-providing daggers, giving +2 compared to the [[white dagger]]'s +1 and [[Wolfbane]]'s +5. Despite this, the keris proves superior — unless fighting [[werewolf|werewolves]], in the case of Wolfbane. It is needed to kill a [[locust rider]] or [[scarab mage]] for a [[Hard Desert Diary]] task.

It is lost on [[death]] if it is not protected, and can be retrieved from [[Osman]], (or [[Selim]], after [[Beneath Cursed Sands]]), for a fee of {{Coins|20,000}}. Alternatively, it can be reclaimed from [[Perdu]] for a fee of {{Coins|25,000}}.
